summary: Philippe, a French-American writer living in Manhattan, decides to take on ten relationship-challenged men to help them learn the art of seduction.
cast: Louis-Do de Lencquesaing|Stephanie Szostak|Jackie Hoffman|Rachel Roberts|Jeff Skowron|Opal Alladin|Pratima Anaé|Brian Avers|Lorie Baker|David Wilson Barnes|Gregg Bello|Bill Dawes|Natascia Diaz|Alex Disdier|Celine du Tertre|Diana Gettinger|Anthony Guerino|Jason Haitkin|Alexa Havins|Jonathan Hova|Ann Hu|Jamie Kolnick|Dave Konig|Paul Lazar|Adam LeFevre|Sal Longobardo|Justin Morck|Thomas J. Pilutik|Esau Pritchett|Nicole Roderick|David Lee Russek|Robert Gordon Spencer|Lin Tucci|Amy Williams|Cynette Wilson|Teresa Woods
title: How to Seduce Difficult Women
